definition: to write off/to cancel an item from accounts
to melt (metal)/to cancel or annul/to sell/to spend/to fasten with a bolt/bolt or pin

sentences.english: Solve the problem of reconciliation before open for the same side and pending items for the other side.
sentences.chinese: 同方未達先銷賬，他方仍掛未達的問題。

sentences.english: Will you give me credit for the call?
sentences.chinese: 請把這個電話銷賬好嗎？
